title: Is it the best choice to buy a OnePlus Nord 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: If u have a budget of that much than you can go for it… otherwise you can look for any other 4g phones during till date… Because since, 5g is still not launched in india and will be on 2021.. then why should we need a 5g device on this time… as for now we have to use 4g only on 5g phones… If u are needed for 5g device then wait some month at least there will be releasing soon 5g device under 10k- 15k soon this year… Hope this help!
Yes it is a better option for upto October because after October Google is going to bring mobile of 5G nearly to the cost of nord but with greater features than nord……
